summary: This is an RSVP form for an FBI Victim Services Division briefing about the Epstein case, sent to Mariann Meier Wang. The form requests attendance confirmation and travel/lodging arrangements for briefings scheduled in Miami and New York in October 2019.

persons.name: Mariann Meier Wang
persons.context: The individual to whom the FBI briefing RSVP form is addressed; they are invited to attend victim briefings in Miami or New York.

events.title: FBI Epstein Victim Briefing - Miami
events.description: Scheduled FBI Victim Services Division briefing regarding the Epstein case to be held in Miami, Florida.

events.title: FBI Epstein Victim Briefing - New York
events.description: Scheduled FBI Victim Services Division briefing regarding the Epstein case to be held in New York, New York.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division organized briefings for individuals related to the Epstein case in October 2019.
Mariann Meier Wang was invited and provided an RSVP form to confirm attendance and arrange travel.
The form indicates the FBI was facilitating and authorizing travel and lodging expenses for attendees.
The document is dated October 8, 2019, with an RSVP deadline of October 4, 2019, suggesting it was sent prior to that date.
